page.description: Aligns all Repeating Section column titles. Used in cases where a Repeating Section is hidden unless shown via Javascript.
page.discussion: Calling this method should not be necessary as the UX Component will automatically prepare all Repeating Sections. However, if any Repeating Section is initially hidden and is only shown using Javascript, the titles on the columns will not be properly aligned. This command will fix the column titles on all Repeating Sections.
